attributes.description: The GWM P-Series double cab has been the double cab entry to the market that has made the most waves in the last couple years. Offering owners excellent performance, super luxurious styling both inside and out as well as a massive list of standard features. This 2021 top specification 2.0 D LT 4x4 Auto model has only done 36 500 kilometers. Standard and extra features that can be found include front and rear park assist, fog lights, aftermarket off road alloy wheels, side steps, a roll bar, tow bar, perforated and cross stitched leather interior, climate control, a factory infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, a multi function steering wheel with cruise control, all round airbags, an automatic gearbox and full selective 4x4 with low range.
